price: Kuma Ubangjinka Yã yi wahayi* zuwa ga ƙudan zuma cẽwa: "Ki riƙi gidãje daga duwãtsu, kuma daga itãce, kuma daga abin da suke ginãwa."
arabic: وَأَوۡحَىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلنَّحۡلِ أَنِ ٱتَّخِذِي مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتٗا وَمِنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ وَمِمَّا يَعۡرِشُونَ
footnotes: * Wahayi na ilhama, watau Allah Ya cũsa wa ƙudan zama ilmin yin sã ƙar gidan zuma da gãne hanyõyin tafiya ta kõma gidanta, da cin kõwane irin furen itãce dõmin a fitar dani'imar abin sha mai dãdi ga mutãne, kuma wanda ya ƙunsa dukkan mãgani ga ciwarwatansu. Wannan ni'ima ce babba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥā rabbuka ilā al-naḥli ani ittakhidhī mina al-jibāli buyūtan wamina al-shajari wamimmā yaʿrishūna
